name: Camera OFF
description:
Camera OFF DESCRIPTION

You are trapped in a dark house. There aren't many lights here, so you'll need a night vision camera. Find it. But beware, this is a strange camera. If you hear a loud noise, turn off the camera quickly because your health bar is going down. Find items, unlock doors and escape!

GOOD LUCK!

CONTROLS:

Move: WASD

Pick up: E

Camera ON: Left mouse button

Camera OFF: Right mouse button

Pause: P

CREDITS:

Wall and floor textures are by Craig Snedeker

If your game is not working properly in your browser, you can download it.
